# pop

**Instance Method**

Removes a media item from the end of a playlist.

## Declaration

```swift
MediaItem pop();
```

## Return Value

The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/mediaitem] object located at the end of the playlist. This method returns `null` if the playlist is empty.

## Modifying the Playlist

- **item**: Returns the media item located in the indicated array index.
- **length**: The number of items in the playlist.
- **Playlist**: Creates a new playlist object.
- **push**: Adds a media item to the end of a playlist.
- **splice**: Deletes the indicated array elements and replaces them with the specified elements.
